name: Righteous Auren
text:
2+ Warrior monsters
When this card is Link Summoned: Special Summon 1 Warrior monster from your Deck to a zone this card points to. If you Summon a monster to a Zone this card points to, this card gains 500 ATK. All monsters this card points to gain half this monster’s attack. You can discard 1 card from your hand; add 1 Warrior monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Righteous Auren" once per turn.
